name: Justice League Heroes
summary: Justice League Heroes is a 2006 console video game for the Xbox and PlayStation 2 platforms. It was developed by Snowblind Studios, published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment in conjunction with DC Comics and was distributed in Europe by Square Enix. Based on the long-running comic book series Justice League and was written by comic book writer Dwayne McDuffie.
info:
• 发行: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
  • 平台: PS2
  • 平台: Xbox
  • 游戏类型: ARPG
  • 游戏引擎: Snowblind engine
  • 发行日期: 2006年11月22日
  • 开发: Snowblind Studios
